title: Israeli Anger Is Growing Over the Conduct of the War
summary: In recent days, growing discontent is emerging within Israel concerning the ongoing war in Gaza, marked by increasing criticism of the conflict's conduct. Key figures, including Israeli political and military officials, are expressing waning support for the war. This shift in sentiment highlights the complex and evolving dynamics within Israel, particularly as the conflict continues with no clear end in sight, and raises questions about the long-term sustainability of the current approach.

title: Couple Nearing Engagement Killed in Washington, D.C
text: Sarah Milgrim and Yaron Lischinsky met while working at the Israeli Embassy in Washington, her father said. Mr. Lischinsky had just bought an engagement ring, an official said.
summary: Israeli diplomats Sarah Milgrim and Yaron Lischinsky, who met while working at the Israeli Embassy in Washington, are central to a recent, yet-to-be-fully-detailed, situation. An official confirms Mr. Lischinsky had purchased an engagement ring. This development, occurring within the context of diplomatic service, suggests a personal event with potential implications for their future careers and family life. Further details regarding the nature of their relationship and potential next steps are presently unknown.
